channel.title: I need a kaiju drop
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I need a kaiju drop" - I will trade anything on the list for a kaiju drop

item.title: Re: I need a kaiju drop
item.content:encoded: Ask delle he needs golden pots he`ll probably give you a low end for it

item.title: Re: I need a kaiju drop
item.content:encoded:
gigadron,

i only have 1 k-dog headband and 1 codec so i cannot trade this, if you want i have a golden potion instead

item.title: Re: I need a kaiju drop
item.content:encoded:
I have a perfect hair if u want. In exchange I want the k-dog headband, 2 sham rocks, the monochrome flowers and a codec.

pm me ingame if u wanna trade
